Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to raising the income cap for senior citizens applying for the enhanced STAR property tax exemption
Summary: Relates to raising the income cap for senior citizens applying for the enhanced STAR property tax exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to raising the income cap for senior citizens applying for the enhanced STAR property tax exemption
